name: Aizen
description: A former captain of the Gotei 13 who betrayed Soul Society and became the leader of the Arrancar.

name: Askin Nakk Le Vaar
description: One of Yhwach's elite Schutzstaffel, capable of manipulating lethal doses of substances.

name: Bambietta Basterbine
description: A Sternritter with the ability to turn anything she touches into a bomb.

name: Coyote Stark
description: The Primera Espada, possessing immense power and loneliness that led to his unique abilities.

name: Grimmjow
description: The Sexta Espada, known for his brutal fighting style and rivalry with Ichigo.

name: Grimmjow (Beast Form)
description: Grimmjow in his released form, resembling a panther.

name: Ichibe Hyosube
description: The leader of the Royal Guard, possessing the ability to manipulate names and meanings.

name: Jugram Haschwalth
description: Yhwach's right-hand man and the Grandmaster of the Sternritter.

name: Jushiro Ukitake
description: The captain of the 13th Division, known for his wisdom and illness.

name: Kenpachi Zaraki
description: The captain of the 11th Division, a fearsome warrior who seeks only battle.

name: Kirio Hikifune
description: A Royal Guard member who specializes in food-based reiatsu enhancement.

name: Kirio Hikifune (Spoon)
description: Kirio in her alternate form, wielding a cooking spoon as a weapon.

name: Kugo Ginjo
description: The leader of Xcution, a group of Fullbringers who opposed Soul Society.

name: Nelliel
description: A former Espada, known for her kind nature and immense strength.

name: Nelliel (Beast Form)
description: Nelliel in her released form, taking on a centaur-like appearance.

name: Oetsu Nimaiya
description: The Royal Guard member who forges the Zanpakuto of the Shinigami.

name: Orihime Inoue
description: A human with powerful healing and defensive abilities granted by her spiritual powers.

name: Retsu Unohana
description: The former captain of the 4th Division, secretly the first Kenpachi and a master of combat and healing.

name: Retsu Unohana (Beach)
description: Unohana in a casual beach setting, showcasing her serene side.

name: Shunsui Kyoraku
description: The captain-commander of the Gotei 13, known for his laid-back demeanor and deadly Zanpakuto abilities.

name: Tenjiro Kirinji
description: A Royal Guard member known as the 'Hot Spring Demon' for his healing techniques.

name: Tenjiro Kirinji (Guitarist)
description: An alternate form of Kirinji where he wields a guitar instead of his usual weapons.

name: Sajin Komamura (Bankai)
description: The captain of the 7th Division, using his giant armored Bankai.

name: Sajin Komamura (Human)
description: Komamura in his human form after abandoning his armor.

name: Senjumaru Shutara
description: A Royal Guard member, known for her intricate weaving techniques.

name: Senjumaru Shutara (Bankai)
description: Senjumaru using her powerful Bankai.

name: Tenjiro Kirinji
description: A Royal Guard member, known for his hot springs healing techniques.

name: Tenjiro Kirinji (Guitarist)
description: Kirinji in his alternate look wielding a guitar.

name: Tia Harribel
description: The Tercera Espada, known for her water-based attacks.

name: White
description: A Hollow created by Aizen, later merging with Ichigo.

name: Yoruichi Shihouin
description: The former captain of the 2nd Division, known for her incredible speed and ability to transform into a cat.
